title: Seagrass 'Neptune Balls' Sieve Millions of Plastic Particles From Water, Study Finds - Slashdot
description: Underwater seagrass in coastal areas appear to trap plastic pollution in natural bundles of fiber known as "Neptune balls," researchers have found.
